title: I bought Kled for 6.400 IP yet I still have my IP (and Kled!)

replies.body: It sounds like there was a delay in your IP balance updating.   Normally, a relog will fix this right up.  Hopefully everything looks alright now, but let me know!

What Porocles said.  

I've had this happen several times but relogging always fixes it for me.
its usualy a visual bug i bought sir kled with rp i got kled and it showed i still got the rp its just a visual lag
Did you confirm you actually are able to spend the ip you still have or do you just see that your ip didn't go down?
well my IP now disappeared. It was weird because I had it like that since yesterday
